Our Experts

Mike Wazowski

Mike founded Mike's Bikes to upgrade the quality of bike repair service available in the city. He's dedicated the last 10 years to making this dream come true.

Melanie Shelton

Melanie is an avid biking enthusiast and a very experienced bike repair person. She has years of experience repairing and building bikes.

Jeremiah Martin

Jeremiah is very passionate about helping you for your bike repair needs. He's an expert at upgrading gear systems and has even built his own!

Flexibility

We do all kinds of repairs.

No matter what type of servicing your bike needs, we've got the right expert.

Tuning

We'll assess your bike's condition and provide you with miscellaneous tuning.
$ 39.99

Tire Checks & Replacement

Get your tires pumped or replaced, as needed.
$ 29.99

Gear System Upgrade

We'll swap out any old gear systems with a brand new one.
$ 39.99

Visit us anytime

We're located at the corner of Dundas and Spadina (in Toronto). Come into our shop at anytime to talk to us and see if we're the right repair shop for you.

P.S. Click on the map to get directions.

Book an appointment

Appointments help speed up your bike's servicing. With prebooked appointments, we can guarantee that your repair will be done within 30 minutes or its free!
